flawed_nl_solution:
Arthur is 2 years older than Susan, so he is 15 + 2 = <<15+2=17>>17 years old.
Bob is 11 years old, so Tom is 11 - 3 = <<11-3=12>>12 years old.
So in total these four family members have 11 + 15 + 17 + 12 = <<11+15+17+12=55>>55 years.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
